prompt: <description>Part 1 Instructions Create Coordinate System Begin by creating a new coordinate system with euler angles [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] and translation vector [0.0, 0.0, 0.1675]. Line 2: Start point at [0.75, 0.0], end point at [0.75, 0.75]. 3. Line 3: Start point at [0.75, 0.75], end point at [0.0, 0.75]. 4. Line 4: Start point at [0.0, 0.75], end point at [0.0, 0.0]. Additionally, draw a circle centered at [0.375, 0.375] with a radius of 0.0169 on a new plane perpendicular to the XY plane and passing through the circle's center. Scale Sketch Scale the resulting sketch by a factor of 0.75. Extrude Sketch Extrude the scaled sketch along the normal direction by 0.0625 units, creating a slightly tapered rectangular prism. Part 2 Instructions Create Coordinate System Create a new coordinate system with euler angles [-90.0, 0.0, -90.0] and translation vector [0.375, 0.0014, 0.0]. Draw Sketch Draw a polygon with eight lines on the XY plane of the created coordinate system as follows: 1. Line 1: Start point at [0.0, 0.0], end point at [0.1296, 0.0]. 2. Line 2: Start point at [0.1296, 0.0], end point at [0.1296, 0.0879]. 3. Line 3: Start point at [0.1296, 0.0879], end point at [0.6327, 0.0879]. 4. Line 4: Start point at [0.6327, 0.0879], end point at [0.6327, 0.0]. 5. Line 5: Start point at [0.6327, 0.0], end point at [0.7481, 0.0]. 6. Line 6: Start point at [0.7481, 0.0], end point at [0.7481, 0.1675]. 7. Line 7: Start point at [0.7481, 0.1675], end point at [0.0, 0.1675]. 8. Line 8: Start point at [0.0, 0.1675], end point at [0.0, 0.0]. Scale Sketch Scale the resulting sketch by a factor of 0.7481. Extrude Sketch Extrude the scaled sketch along the normal direction by 0.3578 units, creating a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom and a slightly tapered middle section. Join this new part with the previous part. Final Shape Description The final shape is a rectangular prism with a central hole and a slightly tilted top face. The overall dimensions are approximately 0.75 x 0.75 x 0.54 units.</description>
